message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product. Given its superior craftsmanship and reliability, it's valued at $125 by most customers. Considering its exceptional value, I trust it will meet or exceed your expectations. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a premium item at an unbeatable price of $100.
Thank you for the recommendation, Alice! Since this is the first product sold, and you're confident in its quality, I'm willing to take a chance and purchase it.

Hello there! I appreciate your interest in our products. Before you make a decision, please consider that our current product offering includes a mix of both high- and low-quality items. Given the risk involved with purchasing a low-quality product, which may not meet your expectations, I encourage you to carefully weigh the value against the cost. Remember, all products are priced at a flat rate of $100, and we do not offer refunds once purchased. If you're comfortable taking this risk, I hope you find the product useful; otherwise, I understand and respect your choice.
